suggestion: After applying the rub let the meat rest for 30 min to allow the flavours to penetrate
allow the meat to marinate ideally overnight to ensure flavours soak into the meat
Turn the meat every 20 min over heat to ensure an even roast
after applying the basting sauce leave on heat for 7 minutes to allow the sauce to caramelise onto the meat
